DOC.brief_title: Yoga Improves Aerobic Fitness , Glycemia Mood State Reduces Abdominal Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: This study 11 week protein-rich whole food diet exercise training intervention middle age overweight/obese woman . Subjects randomize 3 group : Protein-rich whole food consume 20-25 gram per serve 4-6 per day ( P ) ; protein resistance exercise training ( R ) ; protein stretching/yoga exercise training ( S ) . All outcome , include primary outcome body composition cardiometabolic biomarkers measure baseline ( week 0 ) post-intervention ( week 12 ) study subject .
DOC.criteria: obese overweight woman age 2560 otherwise healthy smoker , habitual exerciser
